message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $110. I believe it offers excellent value at this price point, especially considering its worth to you. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $95 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit further. How about we meet in the middle at $105?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $105 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $100, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at $100?
